name: @noxlabs/confidential-transfers-sdk
description: SDK for EVM ERC20 Confidential Transfers
author: Nox Labs

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run update && tsup src/index.ts --format cjs,esm --dts && mkdir -p dist/artifacts && cp -R src/artifacts/proofs-helpers dist/artifacts/proofs-helpers && cp -R src/artifacts/abi dist/artifacts/abi
scripts.update: npm run update:abi -- ConfidentialTransfers ConfidentialTransfersBridgeable ConfidentialOFT && npm run update:typechain -- common src/ConfidentialTransfers src/ConfidentialTransfersBridgeable src/ConfidentialOFT test/utils/mock/MockConfidentialTransfers test/utils/mock/MockConfidentialTransfersBridgeable test/utils/mock/MockConfidentialOFT
scripts.update:abi:
node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p=require('path'); process.argv.slice(1).forEach(n => { const art=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('../../out/foundry/'+n+'.sol/'+n+'.json', 'utf8')); const abi=JSON.stringify(art.abi, null, 2); const d='src/artifacts/abi'; fs.mkdirSync(d, {recursive:true}); fs.writeFileSync(p.join(d, n+'.json'), abi); const camel=n.charAt(0).toLowerCase()+n.slice(1); const ts='export const '+camel+'Abi = '+abi+' as const

export type '+n+'Abi = typeof '+camel+'Abi
'; fs.writeFileSync(p.join(d, n+'.ts'), ts); console.log('Synced ABI:', n) })"
scripts.update:typechain: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const p=require('path'); process.argv.slice(1).forEach(f => { const s=p.join('../../out/hardhat/typechain', f + '.ts'); const d=p.join('src/artifacts/typechain', f + '.ts'); if(!fs.existsSync(s)) return console.error('Not found:', s); fs.mkdirSync(p.dirname(d), {recursive:true}); fs.copyFileSync(s, d); console.log('Synced Typechain:', f) })"
